title: Sustainability Argumentation Development Workshop: Enhancing Discussion-Based Decision-Making Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic sustainability concepts and organizational decision-making experience
context.additional_context: Targeting Elementary Education Institution Administrators, Aimed at Strengthening Sustainability Decision-Making Competencies in Corporate Environments, with Real-Time Collaboration Capabilities Using Digital Devices

learning_goals: In sustainability-related conflict situations, learners can present logical reasoning using at least three argumentation structures
Learners can systematically compare and evaluate pros/cons of sustainability alternatives using the Target-Mat tool
Through collaborative discussions with peers, learners enhance critical reflection abilities regarding sustainability definitions and decision-making processes
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
